com.risk.model

Class PlayerClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.PlayerClass

  • public class PlayerClass
extends java.util.Observable
    This is an Observable Class which has implementations for state change of a player as the game proceeds* Observers for this class are PhaseUI and PlayerDominationView
    Author:
    Navjot, Ashish Sharma

      • gamePlay

        public void gamePlay(int numberOfPlayers,
                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> territoryMap,
                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> continentControlValueHashMap,
                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> strategies,
                     boolean load,
                     boolean trnmnt,
                     int rounds,
                     int currentPlayerIndex)
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is where the game starts and proceeds into various phases.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players
        territoryMap - the territory map
        continentControlValueHashMap - the continent control value hash map
        strategies - the strategies HashMap to store behaviour of each player
        load - boolean variable. True if a saved game is being loaded, False if it is a new game.
        trnmnt - the trnmnt
        rounds - the rounds
        currentPlayerIndex - the current player index
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • startUpPhase

        public void startUpPhase(int numberOfPlayers)
        This method invokes the methods terrPerPlayerPopulate and assignTerritories to carry out the start up phase of the game.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players

      • reinforcementPhase

        public void reinforcementPhase(int plyr,
                               java.lang.String currentPlyrStrategy,

                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> currentMap)
        This method carries out the reinforcement phase.
        Parameters:
        plyr - The player number
        currentPlyrStrategy - It has behaviour of the current player
        continentControlValueHashMap - the continent control value hash map
        currentMap - the current territory map

      • calcDominationValues

        public boolean calcDominationValues(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> playerInfo,
                                    int numberOfPlayers,
                                    int totalTerr)
        This method calculates the domination values and returns true if they have changed.
        Parameters:
        playerInfo - the player info
        numberOfPlayers - the number of players
        totalTerr - number of total territories
        Returns:
        true, if domination values change

      • checkPlyrVictory

        public static boolean checkPlyrVictory()
        This method checks if the player has won. It is invoked after each attack phase.
        Returns:
        true, if a player wins

      • plyrsRemaining

        public static int plyrsRemaining()
        This method counts the number of players present at any instant in the game.
        Returns:
        currentNumberOfPlyrs Current Number of Players
